00026 W.Oracle = function(args){var self = this;
00027   // not from the darwin module inclusion
00028   if(!W.darwin) W.darwin = {oracles:[]};
00029   this.id = W.darwin.oracles.length;
00030   this.worlds = [];
00031   this.isClockShown = false;
00032 
00033   // register autorun func.
00034   W.event(window, 'onload', init);
00035   // register this instance to the darwin's oracle pool
00036   W.darwin.oracles[this.id] = this;
00037 
00041   function init(){
00042     // append worlds' presentation layer
00043     for(var i = 0; i < self.worlds.length; ++i){
00044       var world = self.worlds[i];
00045       world.time = 0;
00046       world.ticks = 0;
00047       if(!world.delay)
00048         world.delay = 0;
00049       if(world.body)
00050         W.body.appendChild(world.body);
00051     }
00052     // tick the worlds registered in oracle
00053     self.run();
00054   };
00055 
00056   // extend/override constructor w/ passed args object
00057   for(var i in args)
00058     eval('this.'+ i +' = args["'+ i +'"];');
00059 };

00069 W.Oracle.prototype.add = function(world){
00070   this.worlds[this.worlds.length] = world;
00071   world.oracle = this;
00072 };
00073 
00077 W.Oracle.prototype.run = function(){
00078   var world;
00079   for(var i = 0; i < this.worlds.length; ++i){
00080     world = this.worlds[i];
00081     if(!world.paused){
00082       if(world.ticks == world.delay){
00083         // run tick()
00084         if(world.tick)
00085           world.tick();
00086         // update clock
00087         if(this.isClockShown && world.clock)
00088           //world.clock.innerHTML = new Date(++world.time * 10);
00089           world.clock.innerHTML = ++world.time;
00090         // init. ticks
00091         world.ticks = 0;
00092       }else ++world.ticks;
00093     }
00094   }
00095   setTimeout('W.darwin.oracles['+ this.id +'].run()', 0);
00096 };

00098 
00105 W.Oracle.prototype.pause = function(){
00106   var world;
00107   for(var i = 0; i < this.worlds.length; ++i){
00108     world = this.worlds[i];
00109     world.paused = true;
00110   }
00111 };

00113 
00118 W.Oracle.prototype.resume = function(){
00119   var world;
00120   for(var i = 0; i < this.worlds.length; ++i){
00121     world = this.worlds[i];
00122     world.paused = false;
00123   }
00124 };

00133 W.Oracle.prototype.showClock = function(isOn){var self = this;
00134   // handle the case executing this method before adding any world
00135   if(this.worlds.length == 0){
00136     W.event(window, 'onload', clock_on_off);
00137   }else clock_on_off();
00138 
00139   function clock_on_off(){
00140     for(var i = 0; i < self.worlds.length; ++i){
00141       var world = self.worlds[i];
00142       // no body, no clock
00143       if(world.body){
00144         if(isOn){
00145           if(!world.clock){
00146             world.clock = W.style('div', 'color:lime;fontSize:11px;display:none');
00147             world.body.appendChild(world.clock);
00148           }
00149           world.clock.style.display = 'block';
00150           self.isClockShown = true;
00151         }else{
00152           world.clock.style.display = 'none';
00153           self.isClockShown = false;
00154         }
00155       }
00156     }
00157   };
00158 };
